sentences.en: A church, school, hospital, asylum, or prison is an institution.
sentences.cn: 教堂, 学校, 医院, 收容所或监狱皆属公共机构.

sentences.en: a sentence of 12 months' detention in a young offender institution
sentences.cn: 在青少年教养院拘禁12个月的判决

sentences.en: a young offender institution
sentences.cn: 少年犯管教所

sentences.en: Bernard works at the same institution as Arlette.
sentences.cn: 伯纳德和阿莱特在同一家机构工作。

sentences.en: Class size varies from one type of institution to another.
sentences.cn: 班级大小因院校类型而异。

sentences.en: Does this institution have any redeeming features?
sentences.cn: 这个机构有什么可取之处吗？

sentences.en: He was transferred to Shoal Creek Mental Institution for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他被转到了肖尔溪精神病院，要在那里无限期地呆下去。

sentences.en: Institution of such schools was geared to these needs.
sentences.cn: 这种学校的建立是与这些需要相配合的.

sentences.en: Larry has been in an institution since he was four.
sentences.cn: 拉里从4岁起就一直生活在孤儿院。

sentences.en: My uncle has become quite an institution at the club!
sentences.cn: 我叔叔在俱乐部里已是颇有名气的人物了!

sentences.en: powerful institutions such as world banks
sentences.cn: 诸如世界银行之类的强大机构

sentences.en: social institutions such as the family and religion
sentences.cn: 家庭和宗教这一类社会制度

sentences.en: That is a charitable institution for the education of young children.
sentences.cn: 那是个从事儿童教育的慈善团体.

sentences.en: That old man in the park is a regular institution.
sentences.cn: 那老人是这公园的常客.

sentences.en: The Brookings Institution has assembled a collection of essays from foreign affairs experts.
sentences.cn: 布鲁金斯研究所将一批外交专家撰写的文章结集出版。

sentences.en: the institution of divorce proceedings
sentences.cn: 家庭和宗教这一类社会制度

sentences.en: the institution of divorce proceedings
sentences.cn: 离婚诉讼程序的制定

sentences.en: the Institution of Electrical Engineers
sentences.cn: 电机工程师学会

sentences.en: This degree programme is fully accredited by the Institution of Electrical Engineers.
sentences.cn: 这门学位课程经电气工程师学院鉴定完全合格。

sentences.en: Your academic achievements will redound to the fame of the research institution.
sentences.cn: 你的学术成就将有助于提高这个研究所的声誉.

words.tran_cn: 制度的；制度上的；学会的
使成惯例的；有组织的；遭受收容机构所产生的不良影响的
使成为惯例（institutionalize的过去式和过去分词）
开始（调查）；制定；创立；提起（诉讼）
医药中心,卫生所,研究机构,公共机构
建立,设立,开创,就职,授权

phrases.tran_cn: 认可财务机构；认可金融机构
n. 旧时美国南部的黑奴制度

trans.tran_cn: 机构，社会收容机构，习俗，建立；开创；制定；设立，出名的人，制度；习俗
trans.tran_en: a large organization that has a particular kind of work or purpose
